name: com.google.ar.core.arfoundation.extensions
description: Google ARCore Extensions for AR Foundation. This package provides access to ARCore features not covered by AR Foundation's cross platform API.

samples.description: The Persistent Cloud Anchor sample using ARCore Extensions. Demonstrates how to host and resolve Cloud Anchors.
The Geospatial sample using ARCore Extensions. Demonstrates how to resolve Terrain anchors, check VPS availability, and obtain the camera's Geospatial pose.
